content.rendered:
Introducing our Floral Bowl, the sweetest present. A delightful table arrangement featuring a posy of seasonal florals to admire and adorn any tabletop in your living space, accompanied by a designer vase from ‘Marmoset Found‘ Australia.

Presented with our signature gift box and trailing ribbon.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one-of-a-kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The flower table arrangement you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Vase size: 15cm x 15cm x 13cm approx.
Vase RRP: $54

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
